Package io.github.parj

Class Deploy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • io.github.parj.Deploy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    @Mojo(name="deploy",
      defaultPhase=DEPLOY)
public class Deploy
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Deploys deployment, service and ingress file to a Kubernetes cluster. By default to connect to the cluster, the app tries to pick up ~/.kube/config to be able to authenticate. The location can be overriden by providing a configuration kubeconfig or by setting an environment variable KUBECONFIG. If the KUBECONFIG environment variable, this will override any setting provided via pom.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

      • connectToCluster

        public void connectToCluster()
                      throws IOException,
                             io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException
        Connects to a kubernetes cluster using the kubeconfig config file. By default the file is in the location ~/.kube/config. This can be overrident by setting the environment variable KUBECONFIG
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is an issue
        io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException - If there is an issue
